scripts.test: >&2 echo "No tests here. Tests are run in development projects (../app and ../backend)."; false
scripts._prepRoll: rm -rf roll/out/* && npm run -s _prepBuildWorker && npm run -s _prepCopy
scripts.serve: $(docker-run-cmd) firebase emulators:start --project=demo-9 | grep -v -E "You are not currently authenticated|Detected demo project ID|The Emulator UI requires a project ID to start"
scripts.ci:build: sh/gen-env-ci.sh > .env.ci && sh/gen-firebase-ci.sh > ../../firebase.ci.js && ENV=ci npm run build
scripts._checkEnv:
[[ -f .env.${ENV-staging} ]] || ( >&2 echo "ERROR: Please create config file '.env.${ENV-staging}' - see README.md.
"; false)
scripts.//_checkPortIsFree:
port-is-free $PORT || ( >&2 echo "ERROR: Port '$PORT' is taken!
"; false)

mere copy at each build is enough. (public/*.css)
